comments.body:
Seals are not buffs. They are stances. You need to use the stance condition (it will be named "Seal" for paladins; its under the "Player Attributes" category.) if you wish to check if you have a specific seal active.

Edited Sep 7, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
